metadata.title: CVE-2021-26252 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in htmldoc in v1.9.12. Heap buffer overflow inpspdf_prepare_page(),in ps-pdf.cxx may lead to execute arbitrary code anddenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.8.27-8ubuntu1+esm3
htmldoc-common - 1.8.27-8ubuntu1+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro with Legacy support add-on: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.27-8ubuntu1+esm3').
